# Estudo sobre a variável resposta

```{r}
library(reticulate)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(reglin)

data(penguins)
data = penguins
data = na.omit(data)
```


```{r}
fit1 = lm('body_mass_g ~ flipper_length_mm', data= data)
fit2 = lm('body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm*species + bill_depth_mm + flipper_length_mm', data= data)

```


```{r}
step(
  fit2,
  direction = "backward",
  scope = list(lower= fit1)
)
```
